text:
Yes they do! A fair few have great internship programs. It's good to be looking at a variety of places, especially early on. I recommend looking at showreels of people who have been successful in applying for those companies, see what works about their reel and if you can set yourself similar briefs with your own work. 
Have you signed up for Blue Zoos internship this year?

Im glad to here University is going well! How did the deadline go? What style of animation are you looking into for your personal projects?
